header.tagline: Senior Quantity Surveyor – Infrastructure & Civil Construction

summary: Experienced Quantity Surveyor with 15+ years in infrastructure projects, specializing in cost estimating and project management, optimizing budgets and exceeding targets by 25%.

items: AU NZS NCC – National Construction Code

bullets.text: Analyzed tender documents meticulously to ensure accurate estimation and compliance with project requirements, leading to a 95% success rate in project bids.
Executed first principle estimating techniques across diverse project sectors including residential, commercial, and infrastructure, achieving cost savings of up to 20%.
Prepared detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ) and tender documents that facilitated streamlined project communication and execution, resulting in a 15% reduction in project delays.
Conducted comprehensive quantity take-offs for civil projects, ensuring precise calculation for foundations, architectural and structural components, resulting in a 98% accuracy rate.
Developed commercial offers and managed cost estimating processes that consistently met client financial constraints and expectations.
Managed supplier quotations for MEP installations, securing competitive pricing and reducing overhead costs by 15%.
Successfully oversaw project development to align with financial strategies, leading to budget adjustments favorable by 7%.
Conducted tender analysis and scoped works defining comprehensive budgets based on preliminary draft drawings, contributing to successful TOC submissions.
Prepared extensive Bill of Quantities (BOQ) including material, labor, and plan list for infrastructure projects, enhancing project tracking accuracy by 12%.
Coordinated the submission of commercial offers with pricing schedules, resulting in competitive and winning proposals for major projects.
Executed quantity take-offs for infrastructure and civil projects in alignment with detailed engineering drawings, improving cost estimation precision by 15%.
Engaged with contractors to clarify scopes and propose method changes, optimizing budgets within set financial constraints and reducing costs by 10%.
Successfully managed projects such as the South Morang Terminal Station, achieving substantial project milestones and client accolades.
Led the evaluation of design variations leading to cost-effective project enhancements and improved financial accuracy by 18%.
Conducted in-depth tender document analysis, leading to precise scoping of project works and optimal resource allocations.
Managed quantity take-offs and detailed BOQs for commercial proposals, sustaining efficiency and compliance with specifications.
Facilitated design follow-ups and clarified tender scopes with architects and engineers, ensuring seamless project integration.
Contributed to successful cost disputes resolution and contract debates, consistently maintaining a resolution success rate above 80%.
Oversaw preparation of construction management documentation, enhancing project oversight and adherence to budget constraints.
Effectively managed quantity take-offs and cost consulting for high-rise residential and commercial projects.
Facilitated feasibility studies and banking documentation for high-rise projects, aiding in funding acquisitions.
Observed project design comparisons to secure cost improvements and budget adherence, enhancing financial stewardship.
Produced feasibility and cost studies for logistics warehouse projects, optimizing designs for constructability.
Executed cost estimation and project design review, ensuring robust financial and project outcomes.
Performed quantity take-offs and cost assessments for prominent hospital and shopping center projects.
Contributed to project budget accuracy and compliance throughout diverse construction phases.
Engaged in proactive design variation assessments, optimizing resource allocation and enhancing efficiency.

additionalExperience: Certified member of the Brazilian Council of Architecture and Urbanism and AIQS. Completed advanced courses in Autodesk Revit Architecture, Revit MEP, and Navisworks Manage.
